title: Introduction to Deep Learning & Neural Networks with Keras
about: Learn the basics of deep learning and neural networks using Keras. Covers perceptrons, activation functions, backpropagation, and building simple neural networks.

topics.name: Perceptrons
topics.details: Understanding the basic building block of neural networks.

topics.name: Activation Functions
topics.details: Explore sigmoid, ReLU, and other activation functions.

topics.name: Backpropagation
topics.details: How neural networks learn through error minimization.

topics.name: Building Neural Networks
topics.details: Constructing and training simple neural networks using Keras.

summary: This module introduces the foundational concepts of deep learning and neural networks, providing hands-on experience with Keras for building and training simple models.
